attributes.action: NHS a medal to honour the Service to the nation though the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: The medal could be designed by the people of the UK
attributes.background: I want the government on behalf of the nation to give a big bonus and to Honour everyone in the NHS with a medal of service to the nation of the uk .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560402
